I too, had a bad experience with a purchase on e-bay only it was in the amo=
unt of over $6000!
Does anyone have a phone number or e-mail address for th=
e person or persons that are responsible for the website? I have tried for =
over a year to get in touch with them without any luck. I just want to let =
them know that a company called "Atlanta Leasing" is very dishonest in thei=
r dealings.
Thanks, Mike
